review_text: Gorgeous home with the cutest kitties :) This was my first time visiting Rochester and I‚Äôm glad to have stayed here, was super cute and offered everything we needed for a nice weekend. Nice and peaceful area with a good walking path around the water.
Totally Recommend it, Amazing Place and very friendly Hosts.

Comfortable, peaceful, and very well-appointed! This place is a gem. Located in the upstairs of a beautiful, historic home, the grounds and surrounding properties are lovely. The apartment had everything needed for a very comfortable stay, and Michael and Laura were very proactive and quick to respond when I had questions. I highly recommend staying here!
We felt like we made new friends! Mike and Laura are awesome. We will definitely stay in touch and would highly recommend.

Michael and Laura's place is absolutely beautiful and in a lovely historic district of the city of Rochester, just a short walk from the Genessee River. The house is on a large property with a deep yard, giving a sense of privacy and peacefulness, just a five minute (at most) drive to the heart of the city. We stayed in the Ellwanger apartment, one of three in the home. It was large and spacious, very clean, well stocked and beautifully decorated - and very private. We were invited to use the yard and front porch, and spent a lot of time relaxing there between exploring the city and visiting family, and felt very at home and welcomed.
We enjoyed taking walks along the Genessee River, to Highland Park, and to the beautiful Mt. Hope Cemetery where we found the graves of Susan B. Anthony and Frederick Douglas - all within a short walking distance. Several restaurants are also within walking distance, with many more just minutes away by car.
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay.
Stay in a lot for Airbnd's this one was one of my favorites. Truly felt at home, great location, beautiful setting. Mike and Laura are amazing host's...above and beyond accommodating.

This place has all the charm of an old Victorian with modern amenities. Nicely decorated. The bedroom and living room were spacious. The hosts were very communicative and responsive. Lots of nice touches. In particular, the rack of umbrellas by the entrance was extremely helpful on our rainy visit.
Lovely old house, generously stocked kitchen and bathroom, thoughtfully decorated, quiet, big yard with views of the river. Recommend!

We had a great stay at Michael and Laura's place - beautiful space, nicely decorated, and well-stocked with everything one could want. Location is also fantastic - close to everything. Will stay again next time we're in town!

Beautiful historic home that made it hard to decide whether to stay in or explore the city! Everything was clean and comfortable. Lovely orientation to the neighborhood and the hosts' favorite spots on the welcome documents in the kitchen. This was a great location for our first visit to Rochester -- walkable to cafes and shopping, and a short drive to many other attractions. Thanks for a wonderful stay!

Highly recommend Laura and Michael's place. When I got to the house, I was honestly amazed at how spacious and well stocked the unit was. Our second stay at this apartment. Everything is as described and very clean. Hosts are very responsive and accommodating. Highly recommend!
Michael and Laura were excellent hosts and were very responsive and friendly. Beautiful area and lots to do within walking distance. Great location, would stay again.
We had another wonderful stay. One if our favorite Airbnb‚Äôs in the area as we visit often to watch our daughter play college basketball.
This was such an amazing place to get away to for a few days. The apartment is charming and so wonderfully located! An easy walk to restaurants, bars, and downtown. We would absolutely stay again!
Lovely place to spend the weekend!
great place, beautiful home and an amazing tour guide

I always love Michael and Laura‚Äôs apartments. This was one on my favorite stays yet. Everything was so cozy and I appreciate the uniqueness of the decor. It made the holidays in Rochester truly special to have a nice place to stay,

Excellent and generous hosts, and unique and well-situated home.
Great place to stay. The grounds are beautiful. Michael and Laura are friendly, helpful, and accommodating.

Nice place!

Awesome house!

Beautiful house

Can't say enough positive things. good experience
